Package Request

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Request
    Request class is the class that represents all the information about a request of a member registered in TimeBanks website, mainly: The title of the request The description of the request the date of the request the time of the request the time required in order for the request to be accomplished the category of the request the service of the request the status of the request
    RequestList
    RequestList is the list that contains all the requests made
    RequestTitleComparator
    RequestTitleComparator enables the user to sort the requests based on their titles
    Service
    Service class is the class that represents all the information about a service of a member registered in TimeBanks website, mainly: The date of the service the time dollars of the service the date of the service
    urgentRequest
    Class urgentRequest is an extension of class Request this class is used when the request owner want his request to be done quickly If someone begin the request before a certain time specified by the request owner, he can win an extra plus to his time dollars
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Category
    Category is an enumeration class that contain nine variables that are: education companionship wellness recreation music business services child care transportation other
    Status
    Status is an enumeration class that contains two variables that are: pending agreed
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TimeBeginServiceNotSetException
